controllers.factory.deprecationÂ¶

Source: src\controllers\factory\deprecation.py

Module OverviewÂ¶

Controller Factory Deprecation Warning System.

Provides systematic deprecation warnings for controller configuration changes, parameter renames, and interface modifications to ensure smooth migration paths.

Complete Source CodeÂ¶

  1#======================================================================================\\\
  2#======================= src/controllers/factory/deprecation.py =======================\\\
  3#======================================================================================\\\
  4
  5"""
  6Controller Factory Deprecation Warning System.
  7
  8Provides systematic deprecation warnings for controller configuration changes,
  9parameter renames, and interface modifications to ensure smooth migration paths.
 10"""
 11
 12import warnings
 13import logging
 14from typing import Dict, Any, List, Optional, Union
 15from dataclasses import dataclass
 16from enum import Enum
 17
 18
 19class DeprecationLevel(Enum):
 20    """Levels of deprecation severity."""
 21    INFO = "info"           # Informational - still supported
 22    WARNING = "warning"     # Will be removed in future versions
 23    ERROR = "error"         # Already removed, error fallback
 24
 25
 26@dataclass
 27class DeprecationMapping:
 28    """Configuration for a deprecated parameter or feature."""
 29    old_name: str
 30    new_name: Optional[str] = None
 31    level: DeprecationLevel = DeprecationLevel.WARNING
 32    message: Optional[str] = None
 33    migration_guide: Optional[str] = None
 34    removed_in_version: Optional[str] = None
 35
 36
 37class ControllerDeprecationWarner:
 38    """
 39    Systematic deprecation warning system for controller configurations.
 40
 41    Tracks deprecated parameters, provides migration guidance, and ensures
 42    backward compatibility during transition periods.
 43    """
 44
 45    def __init__(self) -> None:
 46        self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
 47        self._deprecation_mappings = self._initialize_deprecation_mappings()
 48
 49    def _initialize_deprecation_mappings(self) -> Dict[str, Dict[str, DeprecationMapping]]:
 50        """Initialize deprecation mappings for all controller types."""
 51        return {
 52            'classical_smc': {
 53                'gamma': DeprecationMapping(
 54                    old_name='gamma',
 55                    new_name=None,
 56                    level=DeprecationLevel.ERROR,
 57                    message="'gamma' parameter is not valid for classical_smc. Use 'boundary_layer' instead.",
 58                    migration_guide="Classical SMC uses 'boundary_layer' for chattering reduction, not 'gamma' (which is for adaptive SMC).",
 59                    removed_in_version="2.0.0"
 60                ),
 61                'adaptation_rate': DeprecationMapping(
 62                    old_name='adaptation_rate',
 63                    new_name=None,
 64                    level=DeprecationLevel.ERROR,
 65                    message="'adaptation_rate' is not valid for classical_smc. This parameter is only for adaptive_smc.",
 66                    migration_guide="Remove 'adaptation_rate' from classical SMC configuration.",
 67                    removed_in_version="2.0.0"
 68                ),
 69                'switch_function': DeprecationMapping(
 70                    old_name='switch_function',
 71                    new_name='switch_method',
 72                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 73                    message="'switch_function' parameter renamed to 'switch_method'.",
 74                    migration_guide="Replace 'switch_function' with 'switch_method' in configuration.",
 75                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 76                )
 77            },
 78            'adaptive_smc': {
 79                'boundary_layer_thickness': DeprecationMapping(
 80                    old_name='boundary_layer_thickness',
 81                    new_name='boundary_layer',
 82                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 83                    message="'boundary_layer_thickness' parameter renamed to 'boundary_layer'.",
 84                    migration_guide="Replace 'boundary_layer_thickness' with 'boundary_layer' in configuration.",
 85                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 86                ),
 87                'adaptation_gain': DeprecationMapping(
 88                    old_name='adaptation_gain',
 89                    new_name='gamma',
 90                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 91                    message="'adaptation_gain' parameter renamed to 'gamma' (included in gains array).",
 92                    migration_guide="Remove separate 'adaptation_gain' and include gamma as 5th element in gains array.",
 93                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 94                )
 95            },
 96            'sta_smc': {
 97                'K1': DeprecationMapping(
 98                    old_name='K1',
 99                    new_name='gains[0]',
100                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
101                    message="Separate K1/K2 parameters deprecated. Use gains array instead.",
102                    migration_guide="Include K1, K2 as first two elements in gains array: [K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2]",
103                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
104                ),
105                'K2': DeprecationMapping(
106                    old_name='K2',
107                    new_name='gains[1]',
108                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
109                    message="Separate K1/K2 parameters deprecated. Use gains array instead.",
110                    migration_guide="Include K1, K2 as first two elements in gains array: [K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2]",
111                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
112                )
113            },
114            'hybrid_adaptive_sta_smc': {
115                'mode': DeprecationMapping(
116                    old_name='mode',
117                    new_name='hybrid_mode',
118                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
119                    message="'mode' parameter renamed to 'hybrid_mode'.",
120                    migration_guide="Replace 'mode' with 'hybrid_mode' and use HybridMode enum values.",
121                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
122                )
123            }
124        }
125
126    def check_deprecated_parameters(
127        self,
128        controller_type: str,
129        config_params: Dict[str, Any]
130    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
131        """
132        Check for deprecated parameters and issue appropriate warnings.
133
134        Args:
135            controller_type: Type of controller being configured
136            config_params: Configuration parameters to check
137
138        Returns:
139            Updated configuration parameters with deprecated ones migrated
140        """
141        if controller_type not in self._deprecation_mappings:
142            return config_params
143
144        updated_params = config_params.copy()
145        deprecation_map = self._deprecation_mappings[controller_type]
146
147        for param_name, param_value in config_params.items():
148            if param_name in deprecation_map:
149                mapping = deprecation_map[param_name]
150                self._issue_deprecation_warning(controller_type, mapping, param_name, param_value)
151
152                # Handle parameter migration
153                if mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.ERROR:
154                    # Remove invalid parameters
155                    if param_name in updated_params:
156                        del updated_params[param_name]
157                        self.logger.error(
158                            f"Removed invalid parameter '{param_name}' for {controller_type}: {mapping.message}"
159                        )
160                elif mapping.new_name and mapping.new_name not in updated_params:
161                    # Migrate parameter name
162                    if not mapping.new_name.startswith('gains['):  # Don't migrate array references automatically
163                        updated_params[mapping.new_name] = param_value
164                        del updated_params[param_name]
165                        self.logger.info(f"Migrated '{param_name}' to '{mapping.new_name}' for {controller_type}")
166
167        return updated_params
168
169    def _issue_deprecation_warning(
170        self,
171        controller_type: str,
172        mapping: DeprecationMapping,
173        param_name: str,
174        param_value: Any
175    ) -> None:
176        """Issue appropriate deprecation warning based on severity level."""
177        message = f"[{controller_type}] {mapping.message or f'Parameter {param_name} is deprecated'}"
178
179        if mapping.migration_guide:
180            message += f" Migration: {mapping.migration_guide}"
181
182        if mapping.removed_in_version:
183            message += f" (Will be removed in version {mapping.removed_in_version})"
184
185        if mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.INFO:
186            self.logger.info(message)
187        elif mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.WARNING:
188            warnings.warn(message, DeprecationWarning, stacklevel=4)
189            self.logger.warning(message)
190        elif mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.ERROR:
191            self.logger.error(message)
192            # Don't raise exception - just log and remove parameter
193
194    def get_migration_guide(self, controller_type: str) -> List[str]:
195        """Get comprehensive migration guide for a controller type."""
196        if controller_type not in self._deprecation_mappings:
197            return []
198
199        guides = []
200        for mapping in self._deprecation_mappings[controller_type].values():
201            if mapping.migration_guide:
202                guides.append(f"â€¢ {mapping.old_name}: {mapping.migration_guide}")
203
204        return guides
205
206    def validate_configuration_compatibility(
207        self,
208        controller_type: str,
209        config_params: Dict[str, Any]
210    ) -> Dict[str, str]:
211        """
212        Validate configuration compatibility and return detailed issues.
213
214        Returns:
215            Dictionary mapping parameter names to their compatibility issues
216        """
217        issues = {}
218
219        if controller_type not in self._deprecation_mappings:
220            return issues
221
222        deprecation_map = self._deprecation_mappings[controller_type]
223
224        for param_name in config_params:
225            if param_name in deprecation_map:
226                mapping = deprecation_map[param_name]
227                if mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.ERROR:
228                    issues[param_name] = mapping.message or f"Parameter no longer supported"
229                elif mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.WARNING:
230                    issues[param_name] = f"Deprecated - {mapping.migration_guide}"
231
232        return issues
233
234
235# Global deprecation warner instance
236_deprecation_warner = ControllerDeprecationWarner()
237
238
239def check_deprecated_config(controller_type: str, config_params: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
240    """
241    Convenience function to check and migrate deprecated configuration parameters.
242
243    Args:
244        controller_type: Type of controller
245        config_params: Configuration parameters
246
247    Returns:
248        Updated configuration with deprecated parameters migrated
249    """
250    return _deprecation_warner.check_deprecated_parameters(controller_type, config_params)
251
252
253def get_controller_migration_guide(controller_type: str) -> List[str]:
254    """
255    Get migration guide for a specific controller type.
256
257    Args:
258        controller_type: Type of controller
259
260    Returns:
261        List of migration guidance strings
262    """
263    return _deprecation_warner.get_migration_guide(controller_type)
264
265
266def validate_config_compatibility(controller_type: str, config_params: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, str]:
267    """
268    Validate configuration compatibility for a controller type.
269
270    Args:
271        controller_type: Type of controller
272        config_params: Configuration parameters to validate
273
274    Returns:
275        Dictionary of compatibility issues
276    """
277    return _deprecation_warner.validate_configuration_compatibility(controller_type, config_params)

ControllerDeprecationWarnerÂ¶

Systematic deprecation warning system for controller configurations.

Tracks deprecated parameters, provides migration guidance, and ensures backward compatibility during transition periods.

Source CodeÂ¶

  1class ControllerDeprecationWarner:
  2    """
  3    Systematic deprecation warning system for controller configurations.
  4
  5    Tracks deprecated parameters, provides migration guidance, and ensures
  6    backward compatibility during transition periods.
  7    """
  8
  9    def __init__(self) -> None:
 10        self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
 11        self._deprecation_mappings = self._initialize_deprecation_mappings()
 12
 13    def _initialize_deprecation_mappings(self) -> Dict[str, Dict[str, DeprecationMapping]]:
 14        """Initialize deprecation mappings for all controller types."""
 15        return {
 16            'classical_smc': {
 17                'gamma': DeprecationMapping(
 18                    old_name='gamma',
 19                    new_name=None,
 20                    level=DeprecationLevel.ERROR,
 21                    message="'gamma' parameter is not valid for classical_smc. Use 'boundary_layer' instead.",
 22                    migration_guide="Classical SMC uses 'boundary_layer' for chattering reduction, not 'gamma' (which is for adaptive SMC).",
 23                    removed_in_version="2.0.0"
 24                ),
 25                'adaptation_rate': DeprecationMapping(
 26                    old_name='adaptation_rate',
 27                    new_name=None,
 28                    level=DeprecationLevel.ERROR,
 29                    message="'adaptation_rate' is not valid for classical_smc. This parameter is only for adaptive_smc.",
 30                    migration_guide="Remove 'adaptation_rate' from classical SMC configuration.",
 31                    removed_in_version="2.0.0"
 32                ),
 33                'switch_function': DeprecationMapping(
 34                    old_name='switch_function',
 35                    new_name='switch_method',
 36                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 37                    message="'switch_function' parameter renamed to 'switch_method'.",
 38                    migration_guide="Replace 'switch_function' with 'switch_method' in configuration.",
 39                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 40                )
 41            },
 42            'adaptive_smc': {
 43                'boundary_layer_thickness': DeprecationMapping(
 44                    old_name='boundary_layer_thickness',
 45                    new_name='boundary_layer',
 46                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 47                    message="'boundary_layer_thickness' parameter renamed to 'boundary_layer'.",
 48                    migration_guide="Replace 'boundary_layer_thickness' with 'boundary_layer' in configuration.",
 49                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 50                ),
 51                'adaptation_gain': DeprecationMapping(
 52                    old_name='adaptation_gain',
 53                    new_name='gamma',
 54                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 55                    message="'adaptation_gain' parameter renamed to 'gamma' (included in gains array).",
 56                    migration_guide="Remove separate 'adaptation_gain' and include gamma as 5th element in gains array.",
 57                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 58                )
 59            },
 60            'sta_smc': {
 61                'K1': DeprecationMapping(
 62                    old_name='K1',
 63                    new_name='gains[0]',
 64                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 65                    message="Separate K1/K2 parameters deprecated. Use gains array instead.",
 66                    migration_guide="Include K1, K2 as first two elements in gains array: [K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2]",
 67                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 68                ),

 70                    old_name='K2',

 75                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 76                )
 77            },
 78            'hybrid_adaptive_sta_smc': {
 79                'mode': DeprecationMapping(
 80                    old_name='mode',
 81                    new_name='hybrid_mode',
 82                    level=DeprecationLevel.WARNING,
 83                    message="'mode' parameter renamed to 'hybrid_mode'.",
 84                    migration_guide="Replace 'mode' with 'hybrid_mode' and use HybridMode enum values.",
 85                    removed_in_version="3.0.0"
 86                )
 87            }
 88        }
 89
 90    def check_deprecated_parameters(
 91        self,
 92        controller_type: str,
 93        config_params: Dict[str, Any]
 94    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 95        """
 96        Check for deprecated parameters and issue appropriate warnings.
 97
 98        Args:
 99            controller_type: Type of controller being configured
100            config_params: Configuration parameters to check
101
102        Returns:
103            Updated configuration parameters with deprecated ones migrated
104        """
105        if controller_type not in self._deprecation_mappings:
106            return config_params
107
108        updated_params = config_params.copy()
109        deprecation_map = self._deprecation_mappings[controller_type]
110
111        for param_name, param_value in config_params.items():
112            if param_name in deprecation_map:
113                mapping = deprecation_map[param_name]
114                self._issue_deprecation_warning(controller_type, mapping, param_name, param_value)
115
116                # Handle parameter migration
117                if mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.ERROR:
118                    # Remove invalid parameters
119                    if param_name in updated_params:
120                        del updated_params[param_name]
121                        self.logger.error(
122                            f"Removed invalid parameter '{param_name}' for {controller_type}: {mapping.message}"
123                        )
124                elif mapping.new_name and mapping.new_name not in updated_params:
125                    # Migrate parameter name
126                    if not mapping.new_name.startswith('gains['):  # Don't migrate array references automatically
127                        updated_params[mapping.new_name] = param_value
128                        del updated_params[param_name]
129                        self.logger.info(f"Migrated '{param_name}' to '{mapping.new_name}' for {controller_type}")
130
131        return updated_params
132
133    def _issue_deprecation_warning(
134        self,
135        controller_type: str,
136        mapping: DeprecationMapping,
137        param_name: str,
138        param_value: Any
139    ) -> None:
140        """Issue appropriate deprecation warning based on severity level."""
141        message = f"[{controller_type}] {mapping.message or f'Parameter {param_name} is deprecated'}"
142
143        if mapping.migration_guide:
144            message += f" Migration: {mapping.migration_guide}"
145
146        if mapping.removed_in_version:
147            message += f" (Will be removed in version {mapping.removed_in_version})"
148
149        if mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.INFO:
150            self.logger.info(message)
151        elif mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.WARNING:
152            warnings.warn(message, DeprecationWarning, stacklevel=4)
153            self.logger.warning(message)
154        elif mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.ERROR:
155            self.logger.error(message)
156            # Don't raise exception - just log and remove parameter
157
158    def get_migration_guide(self, controller_type: str) -> List[str]:
159        """Get comprehensive migration guide for a controller type."""
160        if controller_type not in self._deprecation_mappings:
161            return []
162
163        guides = []
164        for mapping in self._deprecation_mappings[controller_type].values():
165            if mapping.migration_guide:
166                guides.append(f"â€¢ {mapping.old_name}: {mapping.migration_guide}")
167
168        return guides
169
170    def validate_configuration_compatibility(
171        self,
172        controller_type: str,
173        config_params: Dict[str, Any]
174    ) -> Dict[str, str]:
175        """
176        Validate configuration compatibility and return detailed issues.
177
178        Returns:
179            Dictionary mapping parameter names to their compatibility issues
180        """
181        issues = {}
182
183        if controller_type not in self._deprecation_mappings:
184            return issues
185
186        deprecation_map = self._deprecation_mappings[controller_type]
187
188        for param_name in config_params:
189            if param_name in deprecation_map:
190                mapping = deprecation_map[param_name]
191                if mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.ERROR:
192                    issues[param_name] = mapping.message or f"Parameter no longer supported"
193                elif mapping.level == DeprecationLevel.WARNING:
194                    issues[param_name] = f"Deprecated - {mapping.migration_guide}"
195
196        return issues

Convenience function to check and migrate deprecated configuration parameters.

Args: controller_type: Type of controller config_params: Configuration parameters

Returns: Updated configuration with deprecated parameters migrated
